mapper.select: select * from notice where notice_category = 'FAQ' and notice_enabled = 1 order by notice_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_no,notice_title, notice_writer,notice_content,notice_date, notice_readcount,notice_category,notice_enabled, notice_date_modified) values('nseq' || lpad (notiseq_seq.nextval,5,'0'), #{noticeTitle},'UrbanTable',#{noticeContent}, #{noticeCategory},sysdate,0,'FAQ',1,sysdate)
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, notice_category = #{noticeCategory}, notice_date_modieifed = sysdate where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
update notice set notice_enabled = 0 where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.select: select A.* from ( select LEAD(notice_no, 1) OVER (ORDER BY notice_date DESC) AS PRE_NO, LEAD(notice_title, 1, '이전글이 없습니다') OVER (ORDER BY notice_date desc) AS PRE_TITLE, notice_no, notice_title, notice_date, LAG(notice_no, 1) OVER (ORDER BY notice_date DESC) AS NEXT_NO, LAG(notice_title, 1, '다음글이 없습니다') OVER (ORDER BY notice_date desc) AS NEXT_TITLE from notice where notice_category = 'FAQ' and notice_enabled = 1 order by notice_date desc ) A where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
